text: @ochocinco @ochocinco or ANYONE that would want to help my family and I. $CarmenDrappeaux I never had asked anyone for help my husband and I have worked and struggled and made sure a 6 wonderful kids where taken care of but now we are both outta jobs(bc of covid-19 for the time being)
